It offers 1st, 2nd and 3rd cycle programs in biology, chemistry, geology, geography, mathematics, physics and veterinary medicine.The Department of Physics of UNamur is recruiting a full-time lecturer who will provide bachelor's and master's in Physics. Research activities will be developed in UR LARN (https://www.unamur.be/sciences/physique/ur/larn) in the field of ion-inert matter interaction, will be based on existing equipment, in particular those of technological platforms (http://platforms.unamur.be/) and will be practiced in particular within the framework of the NISM institute.
